title: The Land of Misfit Bags
description:
Ever wondered where everyone’s lost luggage ends up? Turns out… Scottsboro, Alabama. Nikki discovers more in a conversation with the descendants of the founder of the Unclaimed Baggage Center.

Visit the Unclaimed Baggage Center or shop their online store

Follow Unclaimed Baggage Center on social media @unclaimed bag: Twitter, Instagram, Facebook

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Make a great thing even better. Go to OMGyes.com/SMILE for a special discount.

Upgrade your hard seltzer with Vizzy - vizzyhardseltzer.com
